name: Candy Shop soap Australia
description:
Lollies....Yum!
These bars smell just like Jelly Beans, with notes of Tangerine, Peach, Lemon Drop and Cotton Candy... perfect for kids and adults alike.

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour
............................................................................

name: Oatmeal Milk & Honey soap Australia
description:
Try not to eat it, I know it sounds a lot like breakfast :-) Feel the skin nourishing benefits of full-cream milk, honey and finely ground oatmeal. Smells scrumptious!
Note: the oatmeal very gently exfoliates, if you choose to rub the bar directly onto your skin.

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, oatmeal, milk, honey, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour.

name: Zanzibar Spice soap Australia
description:
Zanzibar is a group of islands, off the East African coast. They're also known as 'Spice Islands', due to their well established trade in spices. Close your eyes, inhale, and spirit yourself there, with exotic notes of Sandalwood, Frankincense, Myrrh, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Cloves, Nutmeg and Patchouli - with a touch of Vanilla.

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sandalwood essential oil, cinnamon, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour.

name: Citrus soap Australia
description:
Fresh, bright, uplifting.. .the pure orange and lemon oils give it that juicy citrus zing!

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, orange and lemon essential oils, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour.

name: Tropical soap Australia
description:
Sweet summer fruits! Peaches, mangoes and coconut….. the smell just sweeps you away to a tropical paradise.

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour

name: Lavender soap Australia
description:
This is the real deal; you can’t get much more lavender than this! Contains pure lavender essential oil, and lavender buds.

Ingredients: cocoa butter, shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, lavender essential oil, lavender buds, fragrant oil, sodium hydroxide (saponifier), colour.
